name: The Charming Manoir
description:
DESCRIPTION
In a green setting, the Charming Manoir offers you the exclusivity of the estate and can either be rented for a midweek stay (Tuesday to Thursday) or over a weekend from Friday 2 p.m. to Sunday 6 p.m. for a brunch following the wedding celebrations on the Saturday.
A list of quality service providers and accommodations that are used to working with the Manoir is available to help you plan a seamless celebration.
YOUR WEDDING AT THE MANOIR
Privatisation of the domain
The Wedding hall with pantry can cater for 100 guests and there is also the exhibition hall, main courtyard, wooded park, orchard and its courtyard (130 people for the cocktail party or the secular ceremony) as well as the medieval vegetable garden.
Furniture
Provision of round tables and white Napoleon III chairs for 110 people, oval table for the bride and groom, screen, chairs and wrought iron garden furniture.
Lanterns
Of ancient architecture, wrought iron lanterns 1.20 m high can adorn the main courtyard, the orchard. Candles will give them a sparkling glow throughout the night.
Napoleon III Outdoor Chairs
For your secular ceremony or outdoor brunch, we offer white Napoleon III chairs designed for the outdoors.
Barbecue Ofyr
A rib of beef or grilled vegetables? An Ofyr barbecue, both brazier and plancha, can be installed and will transform the cooking space into a warm, friendly and welcoming moment for friends and family.
Decorative elements for interiors and exteriors
Medici vases for the wedding hall, easel, vases, frame for the table plan, zinc basins, small cart and logs are available to use.
Decoration and organization advice
The team will be on hand to help throughout your preparations, help and coordination for D-Day.
Optional services
Rolls-Royce with driver
The 1957 Rolls-Royce Silver Cloud, a family car, is available to the newlyweds to use on the wedding day.
Flower Bar
Want to offer a present to your guests? How about a tailor-made flower jewellery display to surprise your guests during the reception?
Hot Air Balloon Flights
An unforgettable experience for your guests from the meadow to discover the park, the view of the manor and the Néron valley from above.
Caterer
We have selected a list of caterers with extensive experience in the world of weddings in order to best meet your expectations.
ACCOMMODATION
THE GARDEN HOUSE
In one of the outbuildings of the Manor, in front of the medieval-inspired vegetable garden, between fruit trees and old plants, 5 bedrooms with personalized and refined decor will allow you to enjoy nature and calm in an environment conducive to daydreaming, relaxation or meditation.
A common living room of 35 m2 with fully equipped kitchen (refrigerator, ceramic hob, dishwasher, oven, kettle, crockery, etc.) will allow you to cook and eat your meals whenever you want.
2 x Duplex - 4 guests
2 x double rooms
1 x double/triple room
THE LODGE
An additional lodge can accommodate another six guests.
EVENT SPACES
Courtyard
You will open the gate and there, your guests will succumb to the magic of the old stones and the size of the famous balls of yew, the true identity of the manoir. Surprised and happy, your guests will not fail to compliment you on the beauty of the place as soon as they arrive
Reception room
Former stable in the 1900s, this room, with its monumental fireplace, will allow you to accommodate between 30 and 110 seated guests. Upstairs, a mezzanine allows you to create a lounge area, a photoboost animation...
Its imposing cathedral ceiling gives it a subtle charm to make it even more magical during the evening, by personalizing it to your image.
Exhibition room
This main building located on the east wing of the building can be fitted out in addition to the reception room to organize a cocktail party or a space for children.
Park
This romantic English-style park is the perfect setting for your cocktail party, secular ceremony or your couple photos. Leave the city behind and immerse yourself in the middle of this bubble among many species, in the shade of giant sequoias, purple beech, ginkgo biloba and araucaria.
You will discover the dovecote which supplied the court of Versailles. Listen to birdsong and you may be lucky enough to come across warrens, squirrels, deer or pheasants coming out of the woods.
Courtyard and its orchard
In the shade of the apple and hazelnut trees, your guests will be able to move around and discover the culinary events during your reception.
A former hayloft, the courtyard becomes a confidential and intimate place for a secular ceremony or a cocktail party in case of capricious weather.
In the evening, the light from its chandeliers gives it a chic bohemian style
The medieval vegetable garden
A truly enchanting place, you will discover or rediscover the wonders of nature: fruit trees with palm leaves, aromatic, medicinal and decorative herbs
Prices :
Weekend (From Friday to Sunday) : 2,5 days , 2 nights for 21 persons : 9800 euros
Week (From Tuesday to Thursday) : 2,5 days, 2 nights for 21 persons : 8800 euros
We can also offer a shooting for the bride and the groom in the drawing room and the library of the manor fully furnished with XVIII century pieces of Arts.
For more information please do contact us and we will be happy to help.
additional_info:
FEATURES
Internet access
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)
Hotel recommendation list
Recommended wedding planner
Recommended suppliers list available
Recommended caterer
Nearest Airport
Golf course nearby
